title: Medal Dao
description: Gamify Life on Blockchain! Medal Dao is a decentralized anonymous organization, using NFT medal idendities to demostrate your personal value.

features.title: Reshape Human Resource
features.description: Medal DAO is a blockchain powered multi-dimensional decentralized identity system. Medal DAO tracks multiple personalities and values of individuals by publishing tasks and recording the completion of tasks.
features.feature1Desc: The completion of every task will be clearly recorded on the blockchain and become proof of personal identity and ability.
features.feature2Desc: All point rewards obtained by completing tasks can actually be swapped to Stable coins or major cryptocurrencies.
features.feature3Desc: Working with a global Dao Community will dramatically reduce the operational and marketing costs for enterprises.

workflow.title: Workflow that just works
workflow.description: How to get your loyalty points and liqudate the rewards?
workflow.step1Desc: Medal NFT is deployed on Matic Network, so obtain the gas, then go to Dashboard and Mint
workflow.step2Desc: Go to Task Center on Dashboard, applying for a new task. Get the rewareds after completing
workflow.step3Desc: Go to Swap Center on Dashboard, Connect to your wallet, then click swap to liqudate

subFeatures.title: Build up the valuable business network
subFeatures.description: Medal Dao welcome everyone to join the community. We will employ "Behaviour Mining" Model, using the community based measurable tasks to facilitate different business senarios. Related community memebers will get rewarded based on our consensus

webinor.title: Webinor Workflow
webinor.description: We will work with our community members to periodically co-organize online webinors.

roadshow.title: Roadshow
roadshow.description: We will work with our community members to co-organize roadshows.

dealmacthing.title: Deal Macthing
dealmacthing.description: After successfully matching the deals, the related community memebers will get rewarded.
